title: Result of Aral Sea drying up, desertification

content.question: Which of the following was the most direct result of the attitude toward the environment reflected in the passage?

choices.label: A push for new varieties of food crops resulting in the Green Revolution
Desertification and increased competition for natural resources
Implementation of government-led land collectivization policies
A rise in Cold War tensions between the Soviet Union and neighboring countries

content.answer: Desertification and increased competition for natural resources

topic.text: 9.3: Technological Advances - Debates about the Environment after 1900

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
